thread.section_title: Wheelbasealloys Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wheelbasealloys | www.wheelbasealloys.com | 3 of 33
thread.title: Mr. Geoff Williamson
thread.title_full: Wheelbasealloys reviewed by Mr. Geoff Williamson

author: Mr. Geoff Williamson
title: Mr. Geoff Williamson
text:
I recently purchased a new set of wheels and tyre because the previous wheels I bought from Wheelbasealloys were discontinued and as I needed one I had to buy a set.
Having said that it was not the companies fault the wheels were no longer available and they arrive on time as promised. When I tried to fit them they had sent the wrong bolts so I used the old ones temporarily.
A new set was sent out immediately I complained and arrived again very quickly.
Subsequent to taking delivery & fitting I received a £25 discount offer which I will be unable to use because I have already bought a set of wheels. It is a shame about the timing because the extra £25 would have helped offset the major expenditure I had not planned for.
I am very pleased with the end product and have sent some photos in for their marketing.
Regards
Geoff Williamson
I Repair Your Computer
